Name: ACUMode
Description: ACU mode

Name: AVCState
Description: State of the AVC

Name: BrakingPrecheckState
Description: Braking precheck state

Name: BMSBalancingState
Description: State of the balancing system of the BMS

Name: BMSCoolingLimit
Description: State on which the cooling limits of the BMS are based

Name: BMSError
Description: Errors that can occur in the BMS main state machine

Name: BMSESSSubState
Description: Sub-state of the ESS state of the main BMS state

Name: BMSState
Description: State of the main BMS state machine

Name: BMSSatState
Description: State of the BMS sat board interface

Name: BMSSatError
Description: Errors contained in the BMS Sat interface

Name: CANOpenHeartbeatData
Description: Data contained in a CANopen Heartbeat message

Name: CANOpenInterfaceDeviceState
Description: State of CANopen device states

Name: CANOpenInterfaceState
Description: State of a CANOpenInterface

Name: CANOpenNMTCommand
Description: Command code for a CANopen NMT message

Name: CANOpenNodeState
Description: State of a CANopen node according to the CANopen node state machine

Name: CANOpenSDOCommand
Description: Different possible CANOpen SDO commands

Name: CellOvervoltageLimit
Description: Factor on which the cell overvoltage of the main BMS state machine is based

Name: ChargingState
Description: Current state of the ChargerFaultFlag

Name: ChargingError
Description: Cause of error for an Error state of the mains charging subsystem

Name: ChargerVoltageSetpointState
Description: State of the setpoint voltage

Name: ChCLimitingFactor
Description: Limiting factor of the charging current of the ChC

Name: ControlState
Description: State of any controlling entity with control access to the ACU

Name: CMSError
Description: Error by the CMS

Name: CMSState
Description: State of the CMS

Name: DNR
Description: Driving direction status

Name: DSSActuationState
Description: Status of the DSS control component

Name: DSSActuationError
Description: Errors that can occur during DSS actuation

Name: DSSControllerError
Description: Contains the possible errors produced by the DSS control system

Name: DSSControllerStartingStage
Description: Stage of the DSS controller startup phase

Name: DSSPrecheckError
Description: Errors that can occur during DSS precheck

Name: DSSState
Description: State of the autonomous system

Name: DualChargerStrategySubState
Description: Substate of the dual-strategy state of the ChC

Name: EPOS4OpMode
Description: Possible operation modes of the EPOS4 motor controller

Name: IMDState
Description: State of the IMD

Name: InverterType
Description: Type of inverter used on the ACU

Name: InverterStatus
Description: Status of an inverter on the ACU

Name: IVTChargingLimitSetting
Description: Setting of the charging limit of the IVT according to the BMS state machine

Name: IVTDischargingLimitSetting
Description: Setting of the discharging limit of the IVT according to the BMS state machine

Name: IVTLimitState
Description: State of the IVT limiting state

Name: IVTStartupState
Description: State of the IVT startup sequence

Name: KeyStatus
Description: Key status

Name: LightingState
Description: State of the main lighting

Name: LVCError
Description: Errors from the LVC

Name: LVCState
Description: State of the LVC

Name: MainsChargingState
Description: State of the mains charging subsystem of the ChC

Name: MotorControlMode
Description: Motor control mode

Name: MPPTState
Description: States of an MPPT connected to the ChC

Name: OnOff
Description: Generic on/off state, might be a bit more descriptive than a boolean

Name: OperationMode
Description: Current operation mode of the ACU

Name: PrimaryDisplayMode
Description: The mode of the primary display

Name: SAEJ1772Current
Description: Contains the possible currents signaled by the SAE J1772 protocol

Name: SAEJ1772State
Description: State of the SAE J1772 protocol on the ChC

Name: SatelliteStartupState
Description: State of the BMS satellite startup sequence

Name: SolarChargingError
Description: Errors that can occur in the solar charging system

Name: SolarChargingState
Description: The state of the solar charging system

Name: TripleChargerStrategySubState
Description: Sub-state of the triple charger strategy state

Name: PVCurrentMethod
Description: Method by which the PV current on the ChC was determined

Name: UVRecoveryState
Description: State of the UV recovery system

Name: VehicleState
Description: The state of the vehicle

Name: WiperSpeed
Description: Speed of the window wiper

Name: SACSetpointType
Description: Steering actuator control types
